bibl.title: Maiden Choruses in the Epinician Odes of Pindar and Bacchylides: Poet's Choral ""I"".
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper presented at the Classical Association Annual Conference 2012 (University of Exeter, 11-14 April). - Argues for a Choral ""I"" of the poet by considering the function of maiden-choruses descriptions in the context and purpose of the epinician poetry. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Smaro Nikolaidou-Arabatzi, Maiden Choruses in the Epinician Odes of Pindar and Bacchylides: Poet's Choral ""I"".

Revised version of a paper presented at the Classical Association Annual Conference 2012 (University of Exeter, 11-14 April). - Argues for a Choral ""I"" of the poet by considering the function of maiden-choruses descriptions in the context and purpose of the epinician poetry. - Avec résumé en anglais.
